actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to broaden and improve the recently-enacted program authorizing the use of death certificates for the verification and correction of information in the OASDI records.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to include in the program authorizing the use of death certificates for the verification and correction of OASDI records death certificate information from hospitals, nursing homes, funeral homes, and other entities required by State or local law to file such certificates.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to broaden and improve the recently-enacted program authorizing the use of death certificates for the verification and correction of information in the OASDI records.
